title: Dude
overview: Dude is the story of a mysterious threat case that revolves around a family. It is based on a life of a detective who manages to outwit the criminals with his common sense and logic. He indulges himself in the nitty-gritty of solving a mysterious case about a threat letter. With suspicious acts going on, while he decides to investigate the case, he ends up unfolding his owns life mystery.
